relics.name: Dancer's Amulet
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 cards in a single turn, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: A mildly special amulet, I suppose.

relics.name: Perk: Alacrity
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Combo.

relics.name: Perk: Blades
relics.description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 random Blade.

relics.name: Perk: Deep Cuts
relics.description: Bleeding enemies take 30% more damage rather than 20%.

relics.name: Perk: Endless Rage
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain 5 Fury.

relics.name: Perk: Healthy Stances
relics.description: At the end of combat,heal 6 HP if you're in a Stance.

relics.name: Perk: Hypercharge
relics.description: Whenever you're attacked, if you're in a Stance, gain 1 Charge.

relics.name: Perk: Lightning Stance Mastery
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you're in Lightning Stance gain 3 Lightning Charges if you have none. Otherwise, gain 1 Lightning Charge.

relics.name: Perk: Offensive Stance Mastery
relics.description: At the start of combat, switch your Stance to a random Stance.

relics.name: Perk: Wind Stance Mastery
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you're in Wind Stance gain 3 Wind Charges if you have none. Otherwise, gain 1 Wind Charge.

keywords.name: Awaken
keywords.description: Awaken one of your spectral blades, making them more potent based on your current Stance.

keywords.name: Bleeding
keywords.description: Bleeding enemies take 20% more damage from attacks, and take damage at the end of the round. Bleeding decays by 3 at the end.

keywords.name: Bloodied
keywords.description: An effect that's applied if the target has less than 50% HP remaining.

keywords.name: Conduit
keywords.description: Whenever you play this card while in a Stance, gain X Charges.

keywords.name: Finisher
keywords.description: A powerful card that uses Fury or Combo as a resource.

keywords.name: Havoc
keywords.description: A spectral blade that deals damage to enemies you attack.

keywords.name: Lacerate
keywords.description: A 0-cost attack that deals 2 damage and exhausts.

keywords.name: Parry
keywords.description: A spectral blade that reduces the damage taken whenever you're struck.

keywords.name: Stance
keywords.description: A battle Stance which determines the type of Charges you get. There are 2 Stances: Wind and Lightning. Upon switching to a Stance, Awaken a Blade.
